about_the_game:
TV Head: Broadcast Breaker

A Chaotic Metroidvania of Censorship, Biscuits, and Mayhem!

In the year 3034, the sinister Ultra Mega Corp controls all broadcasting across the universe, flooding screens with mind-numbing garbage. But hope isn’t lost—because you, a sentient TV with fists of fury, are here to take back control.

Your mission? Shut down Ultra Mega Corp’s corrupt empire, destroy their network of twisted enforcers, and bring back unfiltered content to the masses. Why? Because you can.

Features:

Metroidvania Action – Explore vast, interconnected levels filled with dangerous traps, hidden secrets, and ridiculous enemies.
Chaotic Combat – Punch, dodge, and slam through Ultra Mega Corp’s bizarre enforcers, from mutant biscuits to unhinged corporate overlords.
Brutal Boss Fights – Face Mr. Biscuits and a host of insane bosses, each with hilarious yet horrifying attack patterns.
Absurd Dark Comedy – Experience twisted humor, surreal encounters, and over-the-top moments that will leave you laughing (or questioning reality).
Unlockable Abilities – Gain new skills to access hidden areas, unleash devastating attacks, and turn the tides against Ultra Mega Corp.
Dynamic Soundtrack – A mix of retro-futuristic beats and chaotic tracks that adapt to the action.

Mr. Biscuits & The Ultra Mega Corp

Your first major showdown? Mr. Biscuits, an unhinged, biscuit-obsessed enforcer guarding one of Ultra Mega Corp’s broadcasting hubs. His demands are questionable, his methods disturbing, and his fate? Best left unspoken.

But he's just the beginning. Ultra Mega Corp has more horrors in store—and you’re going to take them all down, one ridiculous boss fight at a time.

Are you ready to reclaim the airwaves and destroy Ultra Mega Corp?

Prepare for the most unhinged, brutally funny, and action-packed Metroidvania experience yet!

name: Tv Head

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 353 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: In 3034, Ultra Mega Corp controls all broadcasting, censoring the universe into submission. As TV Head, a sentient television with fists of fury, you must fight, explore, and break the signal lock in this brutal, darkly hilarious Metroidvania.
